mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select * from webtoon where title=#{title}) cross join (select count(*) as totalgood from episodegoodview where episodegood='T' and title=#{title})) cross join (select count(*) as totalview from episodegoodview where episodeview='T' and title=#{title})
select episodecode, episode, title, thumbnail, to_char(updatetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updateTime , free from episodelist where title=#{title} order by episodeCode desc
